name: Underwater Affect
description:
Game genre: Platformer, action.

They say that the same river twice not enter. That the first impression can be deceptive.
That you can't reach the tip of your tongue to the tip of your nose. That if you throw a stone in the water, the circles will go.
Is it true? I don't know. But I know.
Phoenixxx Games has done the impossible, and literally broke through the ceiling, setting a new bar in the quality of furious action "Underwater affect".
As the name implies, we have to go down into the ocean depths, where after a planetary cataclysm there are only two-dimensional forms of life.
And it's really scary, especially in full screen mode.
Sometimes you have to persuade yourself not to close this game.

The game is a shooter with a side view. The character you control with the arrow keys is in the center of the screen, he has a gun. During the game, you will need to walk and perform various tasks and defend against monsters,
which will need to kill with a gun (left mouse button).

The main character, a pink-cheeked shameless man in a seductively tight latex, catches a distress signal and, without much bothering his brain, comes to the rescue.
And it is worth it to cross the threshold of the sinister underwater station, as soon as it becomes clear - it is not loved here.
And before he gets to (spoiler alert: the game has a plot).
However, you will see everything yourself - believe me, your expectations and monotonous murders, giving the Hero a complex personality with a dark past, still justify themselves.
Not this one, next time for sure.
